query: WITH entities AS (SELECT status, public_ref, id FROM core_customers WHERE ((status = $1) AND (COALESCE((public_ref, id) > ($4, $3), $3 IS NULL))) ORDER BY public_ref ASC, id ASC LIMIT $2) SELECT i.id AS "entity_id: CustomerId", e.sequence, e.event, e.recorded_at FROM entities i JOIN core_customer_events e ON i.id = e.id ORDER BY i.public_ref asc, i.id asc, i.id, e.sequence
